display_long_description:
Your reality is under siege! 💥 In Battle Bots, the ultimate mixed reality wave shooter, your own room transforms into an electrifying battlefield. Prepare for an action-packed adventure where cute but deadly robots and creatures pour into your world.

But you don't have to face them alone!

Key Features:

    🤖 Your Trusty Companion: You're not alone in this fight! Your loyal companion Bot fights by your side, helping you take down enemies and survive the chaos.

    👾 Cute & Deadly Hordes: Face waves of adorable yet deceptively dangerous robots and creatures. Don't let their charm fool you—they mean business!

    💎 Configure Your Bot: Choose between light, medium, and heavy bot types to perfectly match your combat style. We're actively working on expanding Bot customization features - join our Discord to share your feedback!

    💪 Unleash Powerful Abilities: Turn the tide of battle with a variety of game-changing power-ups that boost your firepower and defenses. These become critical in late-game. 

    👹 Epic Boss Fights: Test your skills against colossal bosses in spectacular showdowns that will push you to your absolute limit.

Can you and your companion survive the invasion? Get Battle Bots from the Meta Horizon Store today and defend your reality!

This mixed-reality game is in early access. We want to hear your feedback! Join our discord and share any suggestions or ideas you have. Link at the company website bellow.
